cs.NE, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.CC, cs.SY. 

The paper discusses the role of neural networks in integrating multisensory signals and capturing context-dependent meanings, which is a common topic in the fields of neural networks (cs.NE), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), and machine learning (cs.LG). The paper also proposes a new theory on the role of awareness and universal context in neural networks, which could be relevant to the subfield of cognitive computing (cs.CC). Finally, the paper discusses the potential applications of the proposed theory in modelling human behaviour, which could be relevant to the subfield of systems and control (cs.SY).
